title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: The Amazing Race’s Phil Keoghan Details Production Protocol for Mid-Race Fender Benders
description: A lot of varying factors can come between The Amazing Race contestants and a million dollars. Fender benders on the road? Those are extremely high on that list. In Thursday’s Season 37 finale (read our recap here) Han and Holden suffered that exact fate while trying to navigate to Miami’s Domino Park in the race’s […]
author: Nick Caruso

title: Grey’s Anatomy’s Hot New Doc: Did Your First Impression Leave You Wanting Seconds?
description: Before the Season 21 finale of Grey’s Anatomy revealed that Trevor Jackson had been cast as a new surgical intern, his character was already playing doctor with Simone. Are we happy about that? No of us can say that the grown-ish vet didn’t make a memorable first impression. In Season 21’s penultimate episode, his on-screen […]
author: Charlie Mason
